title: Wonder
content:
The Temple of Edfu was built during the Ptolemaic reign of Egypt. However, the structure was built in traditional Egyptian style and dedicated to Horus, a traditional Egyptian deity.

Construction of the temple began in 237 BC, over the site of a previous temple to Horus. The temple was finished  in 57 BC and had an area of 64,626 square feet (6004 square meters).
